formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: ft³ = cords × cord_size_ft³ full cord: ft³ = cords × 128 face cord (16 in): ft³ = cords × 42.6667

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: cords = ft³ ÷ cord_size_ft³ Example: 96 ft³ ÷ 128 = 0.75 cord
